nodes.text: Permission Granted is a short story written by Peter M. Schweighofer and published in the Shadows of the Empire Sourcebook.

Shortly after her escape from Cloud City, Leia Organa asks Mon Mothma and Admiral Gial Ackbar for permission to recruit a small team of Rebels -- Luke Skywalker, Chewbacca and Lando Calrissian -- in order to search for Han Solo.
